short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is Chrome Extension for RECEPTIONIST

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With your RECEPTIONIST account, you can
- copy or issue one-time link for your booking pages
- automatically issue a reception code while creating an event in your own Google Calendar
long.ja: Google Calendarから受付コードの発行、調整アポの予約ページの管理がブラウザ上で可能になります。
